LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: multi-analysator
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Byg multi-analysatorer som øger forskningshastigheden og åbner op for et højere niveau af forskningsprojekter. Avancerede komponenter er påkrævet for at bygge den.
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.label: ground-penetrating scanner
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.description: Build ground-penetrating scanners that can detect drillable resources under the surface. Requires advanced components to construct.
LanguageData.DeepDrilling.label: dybdeboring
LanguageData.DeepDrilling.description: Byg dybdebor til at udvinde ressourcer fra jorden. Du skal have en ground-penetrating scanner til at finde ressourcerne først.
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.label: patientmonitor
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.description: Byg patientmonitorer som forbedrer de lægelige resultater, når de er placeret ved siden af hospitalssenge.
LanguageData.Fabrication.label: fabrikation
LanguageData.Fabrication.description: Byg fabrikationsstationer, capable of high-tech projects ranging from component assembly to power armor construction.
LanguageData.AdvancedFabrication.label: avanceret fabrikation
LanguageData.AdvancedFabrication.description: Fabrikér avancerede komponenter fra standardkomponenter og andre materialer.
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.label: cryptosøvnskiste
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.description: Construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of indefinite suspended animation.
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.label: powered armor
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.description: Build the power armor and power armor helmets. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.ChargedShot.label: pulse-charged munitions
LanguageData.ChargedShot.description: Build weapons which fire pulse-charged munitions for extra damage. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.Bionics.label: bioniske dele
LanguageData.Bionics.description: Byg høj-teknologiske bioniske kropsdele til at erstatte mistede legemsdele og øjne. Kræver en erfaren doktor for at installere.
